de.tub.ise.midi.music

Class MidiNoteSequenceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tub.ise.midi.music.MidiNoteSequenceBuilder

  • public class MidiNoteSequenceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    helps building simple MidiNoteSequence instances where notes are played in strict sequence (one after the other), i.e., no note starts before the previous note has ended
    Author:
    Dave

      private double fractionCounter
      determines the offset where the next note will be added

      • appendRest

        public MidiNoteSequenceBuilder appendRest(double fractionOfAWhole)
        appends the specified rest length to the sequence (=nothing is played)
        Parameters:
        fractionOfAWhole - a value of 1 corresponds to a WHOLE note (= 4 quarters)
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining
